div.head: 大小便不利
div.div: major and minor relief impeded; stools and urine do not pass freely

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major and minor relief impeded; stools and urine do not pass freely

sense.def: Illness Sign Combined Designation of xiao bian bu li 小便不利 , urination does not pass freely, and da 大便不利 bian bu li 大便不利 , stools do not pass freely. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 42: 熱病，熱入大小腸， 並令大小便不利也 , “Heat disease. Heat enters the large and small intestines, and it causes stools and urine not to pass freely ”.
